body:
So me and a million other new players cant really see our stats. When we go to our profiles, it says "loading" but never actually loads. Ive made a post about this before and iwas told itd be fixed later. Months later, not fixed.


Is funky working on fixing this or does he not know about it?

title: Stats Glitch Still Not Fixed :(
